org.drip.function.definition

Class RdToRd

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.function.definition.RdToRd

  • public abstract class RdToRd
extends java.lang.Object
    RdToRd provides the evaluation of the R^d To R^d objective function and its derivatives for a specified set of R^d variates. Default implementation of the derivatives are for non-analytical black box objective functions.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
